source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is an architectural scenery shot depicting a long, narrow, and seemingly endless corridor. The focus is on the disorienting and vast scale of the environment itself, creating an eerie, liminal atmosphere rather than highlighting a specific subject. Every surface, including the floor and the towering parallel walls, is covered in a uniform grid of small, pale yellowish-green tiles with dark grout lines. The space is filled with a thick, hazy fog that obscures the far end of the corridor, and the scene is bathed in a diffuse, sourceless light of the same sickly green-yellow hue, enhancing the unsettling and sterile quality of the location. The perspective is slightly distorted with darkened, curved edges, as if viewed from inside a mask or through a wide-angle lens.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt:
The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject. Please concisely specify the type of scenery shot (e.g., a landscape or cityscape scenery shot) in a single fluent paragraph.Also explain why there is no main subject, such as the focus being on the environment, atmosphere, or scale rather than a specific object. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

Please avoid using phrases like "the first frame" or "the last frame" in your description. Instead, refer to the entire sequence simply as "the video." Your description should integrate observations from all frames into a cohesive, temporally and logically consistent narrative, rather than describing frames in isolation. Whenever you mention a subject, be sure to include detailed descriptions of its key visual attributes. The final output should be a single, fluent paragraph describing the video, with no Markdown formatting or introductory text. Don't mention the surroundings or the subject's motion unless necessary to distinguish subjects by location, action, or relationship.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: The description inaccurately portrays the corridor as seemingly endless. In reality, the camera captures a view through a short descending staircase, leading into a room beyond. Please revise the description to refer to the narrow corridor as a narrow staircase, as they are the same in this context.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The description inaccurately portrays the corridor as seemingly endless. In reality, the camera captures a view through a short descending staircase that leads into a room beyond. Please revise the description to refer to the narrow corridor as a narrow staircase, as they are the same in this context.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: The description inaccurately portrays the corridor as seemingly endless. In reality, the camera captures a view through a short, not long, descending staircase that leads into a room beyond. Please revise the description to refer to the narrow corridor as a narrow staircase, as they are the same in this context.
source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This is an architectural scenery shot depicting a narrow, descending staircase that leads into a room beyond. The focus is on the disorienting and vast scale of the environment itself, creating an eerie, liminal atmosphere rather than highlighting a specific subject. Every surface, including the steps and the towering parallel walls, is covered in a uniform grid of small, pale yellowish-green tiles with dark grout lines. The space is filled with a thick, hazy fog that obscures the view into the room, and the scene is bathed in a diffuse, sourceless light of the same sickly green-yellow hue, enhancing the unsettling and sterile quality of the location. The perspective is slightly distorted with darkened, curved edges, as if viewed from inside a mask or through a wide-angle lens.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is an architectural scenery shot depicting a narrow, descending staircase that leads into a room beyond. The focus is on the disorienting and vast scale of the environment itself, creating an eerie, liminal atmosphere rather than highlighting a specific subject. Every surface, including the steps and the towering parallel walls, is covered in a uniform grid of small, pale yellowish-green tiles with dark grout lines. The perspective is slightly distorted with darkened, curved edges, as if viewed from inside a mask or through a wide-angle lens.

bad_caption: This video features a bustling city street scene with several pedestrians walking along a wide sidewalk. The main subject is a middle-aged man with light skin, short brown hair, and a trimmed beard, wearing a blue business suit and carrying a black leather briefcase in his right hand. To his left, a woman in a bright red dress and white sneakers is holding a takeaway coffee cup and looking at her phone. In the background, a yellow taxi cab is parked at the curb, and a cyclist wearing a green helmet rides past. The scene is brightly lit by direct sunlight, casting sharp shadows on the pavement, and the overall atmosphere is lively and energetic, with people moving in different directions and engaging in various activities.
